thread.title: MovieNews | Watch: The final promo for Spectre drops and it looks phenomenal
thread.title_full: MovieNews | Watch: The final promo for Spectre drops and it looks phenomenal - entertainment.ie

author: Brian Lloyd
title: MovieNews | Watch: The final promo for Spectre drops and it looks phenomenal
text:
The wait is almost over..
Daniel Craig once again teams up with Oscar winning director Sam Mendes for another entry into the mythos of James Bond. And the $300 million production looks like every penny was spent on screen.
You'll have to wait until October 26th before you see it, but be happy that you're actually getting it well over a week before the US.
Sound.
Have a butchers below
MORE: Daniel Craig says he's NOT done with James Bond just yet
MORE: Daniel Craig says he'd rather self-harm than do another Bond movie
MORE: Watch: The first full trailer for 'Spectre' is here
